Her business is the best thing that ever happened to her because she has been able to use her profits to enjoy a better quality of life.  Xochilt says that what she most likes about her business is going out to sell her merchandise and meet with her customers.  On the other hand, the biggest challenge she faces is that sometimes her customers don't have enough money to pay her for the merchandise that they have bought.  This means that Xochilt loses profits and time.  She decided to start this business in order to help her husband with their household expenses so that, between the two of them, they could offer their children a better quality of life.

Xochilt believes herself to be a special person because she really enjoys improving herself and overcoming obstacles and barriers that she finds in her path.  When she is sad, she thinks of her value as a person and what her business means to her.  Xochilt says that when she sets herself a goal, she does her very best to achieve it.  She has requested her loan to buy more plastic containers to sell wholesale and retail.

The other members of this group are:

Martina - who sells cold cuts
Maricela - who sells perfumes
Paz Daniela - who sells bread
Candida Blanca - who sells clothes
Marisol - who sells costume jewelry
María Antonia - who sells building supplies
Patricia - who sells shoes
María Elena - who sells clothes
Abith - who sells shoes

The women would like to thank Vision Fund for helping entrepreneurial, successful women.

loans.use: to buy plastic containers to sell wholesale and retail

loans.name: Las Águilas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Las Águilas, está conformado por doce mujeres originaras de una hermosa ciudad llamada Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora Herminia mejor conocida como doña Hino de sesenta y seis años de edad. Doña Hino se dedica a la venta de tamales, tortillas elaboradas a mano y sopes desde hace veintitrés años. Desde muy pequeña empezó a trabajar, ya que sus padres no contaban con tantas oportunidades económicas y no les alcanzaba su ingreso para alimentar a sus hermanos. Primeramente, Doña Hino empezó a vender empanadas de de leche y dulces, pero no tenía suficientes ganancias y decidió vender tortillas hechas a mano, negocio que resultó rentable. Con el tiempo, sus clientes le pedían que vendiera tamales; aunque Doña Hino no sabía si se vendería bien este platillo típico mexicano se arriesgó, como siempre la ha gustado hacer. 

Doña Hino dice que lo que más le gusta de su negocio es elaborar sus tamales ya que descubrió que tiene una buena sazón y desea aprovechar ese don para seguir trabajando y sobre todo aprovechar las oportunidades que le dan sus clientes para seguir vendiendo, ya que ellos mismos la recomiendan por la atención que les brinda. A pesar de haber perdido a su esposo hace 20 años y necesitó trabajar con más intensidad para alimentar a su familia, dice que nunca le costó mucho trabajo pues le gusta mucho trabajar. Además, menciona que hasta ahora ha aprovechado todas las oportunidades que encuentra en el camino: alguna vez trabajó como campesina y también como pescadora para darles a sus tres hijos una buena educación. Doña Hino pidió un crédito para comprar ingredientes para la elaboración de tamales, además, compró maíz y leños. Doña Hino quiere enviar un mensaje a todas las personas: "Aprovechen todas las oportunidades que se les atraviesen el en camino, ya que no siempre se presentan".

Las demás integrantes del grupo son:

María Antonieta- se dedica a la venta de mercancía de abarrotes.
Margarita – se dedica a la venta de comida.
Juliana Adelfa - se dedica a la venta de comida.
Amada - se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Guadalupe - se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Hilda - se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Irene - se dedica a la venta de quesos.
Antonia - se dedica a la venta de calazado. 
María Irene - se dedica a la venta de comida.
Zeferina - se dedica a la venta de comida.
María Elena - se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.

Le dan las gracias a Vision Fund por ayudar a todas las mujeres mexicanas.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Las Águilas' (The Eagles).  Its twelve members are all women from a beautiful town called Pinotepa Nacional in Oaxaca.

One of the members of this group is Herminia, better known as Hino.  She is 66 years old and has been selling tamales, hand-made tortillas and 'sopes' (fried tortillas topped with beans and sauce) for 23 years.  She started working when she was very young because her parents didn't have too many financial opportunities and they didn't make enough income to feed her brothers and sisters.  Hino set out selling 'empanadas de leche' (plantain dumplings stuffed with milk pudding) and other sweet treats.  However, this didn't make her enough profits and so she decided to start selling hand-made tortillas.  This business proved profitable.  Over time, her customers started asking her to sell tamales as well.  Although Hino didn't know whether this typical Mexican dish would sell well, she took the risk as she has always liked to do.

Hino says that what she most enjoys about her business is making her tamales because she discovered that she makes them with good flavor.  She would like to make the most of this gift and keep working.  Above all, she would like to make the most of the opportunities that her customers give her to keep selling her products.  Her customers recommend her because of the service that she provides.  Despite the fact that she lost her husband 20 years ago and needed to work harder in order to feed her family, Hino says that it wasn't so difficult because she really enjoys working.  In addition, she says that she has always made the most of all the opportunities open to her.  In the past she has worked as a farm laborer and also as a fisherwoman in order to provide her three children with a good education.  Hino requested this loan to buy ingredients with which to make her tamales.  She also bought corn and logs.  Hino would like to send everybody a message: "Make the most of all the opportunities that present themselves in life as they don't always appear".

The other members of this group are:
María Antonieta - who sells groceries
Margarita - who sells food
Juliana Adelfa - who sells food
Amada - who sells perfume
Guadalupe - who sells Mexican snack foods
Hilda - who sells clothing
Irene - who sells cheese
Antonia - who sells shoes
María Irene - who sells food
Zeferina - who sells food
María Elena - who sells Mexican snacks

The women would like to thank Vision Fund for helping all Mexican women.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making tamales, corn and logs

loans.name: La Patience 2 Group

texts.en:
Patrice, age 52, is married with six children aged seven to 26 years. He owns a photography business. He has been in business for 15 years! He has a good reputation in the community due to his professionalism and dependability.

Patrice is representing the La Patience 2 group. His group is applying for a first loan of 900,000 XAF through Kiva's partner HOPE Congo to be apportioned four ways. He will use his part of the loan to buy camera accessories and photo printing equipment. He intends to sell as many photos as he can to his clients.

Patrice is very excited about this opportunity to buy more equipment for his business. He hopes to travel abroad and take professional pictures one day.

loans.use: to buy camera accessories and photo printing equipment.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 33 years old and Lebanese. He is married to Noura, and they have three school-aged children. He is responsible for paying his children’s study fees as well as all of life’s heavy expenses. He is trying his best to build a good future for his family.

Ahmad started to work in construction in 1997. He works on a freelance basis and has more than a few projects lined up. The more of these projects he has, the higher his revenues will be.

Today, he is applying for a 1500 USD loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new tools and construction supplies for his business. He’s going to start a new project very soon, and this loan will help him accomplish that. Ahmad is an ambitious young man who is looking to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and construction supplies.

loans.name: El Batallon De Jehova 1, 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Albania is a member of the El Batallon de Jehova (Jesus Christ’s Troops) Group located in the city of San Pedro de Macoris where businesses as diverse as industrial cement plants and the sale of household and cosmetic products are among the area’s economic activities. This group comprised of twenty members sell different products all over their rural community as well as some others nearby.

Selling used clothes is a very popular business in the Dominican Republic and Haiti. Bundles holding hundreds of used garments are shipped from the United States and Europe. These are sold to major suppliers who then sell them to individual vendors. Sellers break open the bundles, then select the best quality items to sell at different prices.

Albania is one of these vendors. She is a married woman with three children who has sold used clothes for the past two years. This will be the second time Albania has participated in a group loan. She successfully repaid her previous obligations.

El Batallon de Jehova is applying for a 177,500 DOP loan from Esperanza International. Albania will use her portion of this loan to buy another bundle of used clothes. Her dream is to increase her sales and grow her business. She thanks all of you for your support!!

loans.use: to buy used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Florita

texts.en:
Florita, 50, is married, has three children and lives in Talic, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. Florita is engaged in buying and selling goods to earn a living and has had this business for seven years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock for her general store.
Florita has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Florita hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Luneta

texts.en:
Luneta, 44, is married, has five children and lives in Tipan, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Luneta has a general store business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month. She has requested a loan of PHP 14,900  to purchase more stock for her general store. 
Luneta has been a member of PMPC for two years.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia is 54 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin. She is married and has four children. For the past six years she has run a store where she sells a variety of goods.

Herminia has been a member of PMPC for five years. She is applying for a loan of 40,000 PHP from PMPC to buy additional items such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergent, etc. to stock her store. In this way she hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her store.

loans.name: Leonilo

texts.en:
Leonilo is married, with 7 children. He is 47 years old and lives in Ubay, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

Leonilo sells piñato to earn a living, and he has had this business for 20 years. He has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase kilos of peanuts to make piñato.

Leonilo is a new member of PMPC.  In the future, Leonilo hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase kilos of peanuts to make piñato to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a vehicle.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: El Sr. Julio es divorciado, vive solo, en una casa que es propiedad de uno de sus hijos.  Comenta que 2 de sus hijos lo apoyan con sus gastos personales enviándole mensualmente dinero de los estados unidos.  Actualmente también recibe una pensión mensual muy modesta por parte del instituto mexicano del seguro social, por lo que tiene que recurrir a solicitar prestamos para solventar los gastos de su enfermedad ya que sus medicamentos y estudios son demasiado caros.  Es originario de villa hidalgo, San Luis Potosí, pero radica en nuevo Laredo desde hace vario años.
texts.en: Julio is divorced and lives alone in a house that belongs to one of his children.  He comments that two of his children support him with personal expenses sending him money monthly from the United States.  He also earns a very modest monthly stipend from the Mexican Social Security System which is why he has to turn to loans to cover costs associated with his illness since his medicine and tests are too expensive.  He is from Villa Hidalgo, San Luis Potosí but has lived in Nuevo Laredo for several years.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: El Sr Ricardo es casado y con tres hijos tiene, 3 años viviendo en su casa la cual esta pagando, ya tiene 10 años trabajando como velador para una empresa, su esposa se dedica al hogar, necesita se le apoye para pagar la escuela de sus hijos pues quiere que tengan un futuro prometedor pero para ello se necesita de ayuda ya que el pago de inscripciones, no es algo fácil teniendo tres hijos y no es solo eso si no que también la compra de uniforme, útiles escolares que no son nada baratos. El desearía poder llevar esta carga con menos peso y mas llevadero.
texts.en: Ricardo is married and has three children.  He’s been living in his house for three years and is still paying it off.  He’s been working as a watchman for a firm for ten years now and his wife is a housewife.  He needs help to pay for his children’s schooling so that they will have a more promising future; he needs help to pay tuition.  It’s not easy having three children and it’s not just that, he also has to buy uniforms and school supplies which are not cheap.  He’d like to be able to carry this load a little more easily.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Milamel

texts.en:
Milamel is 35 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin.  Milamel is married, with one child. 

Milamel has a general store that sells variety of products.  She has had this business for seven years.  She requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional products, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents.

Milamel has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, Milamel hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents, for her general store.

loans.name: Genna

texts.en:
Genna is 47 years old and lives in Pangi, Siquijor, Siquijor. She is married, with three children.

To earn a living, Genna has a business selling longganisa, a kind of sausage.  She earns about PHP 3,000 each month doing this work.  Genna has requested a loan to order more homemade longganisa to sell.

Genna has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for more than a year.  In the future, Genna hopes to succeed in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more homemade longganisa to sell.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El Sr. Miguel es originario de esta ciudad y labora para una empresa constructora desde hace más de 10 años, su esposa la Sra. Concepción lo apoya con los gastos de su vivienda ya que ella vende ropa usada afuera de su domicilio.
La casa en la que vive no tiene protección al frente y es una de las calles mas transitadas y el riesgo de un accidente con los niños pequeños los cuales son sus nietos es muy grande y tiene miedo que por descuido de alguien les valla a pasara algo. Ahora tiene el compromiso de proteger la seguridad de su familia y su patrimonio con la construcción del portón principal.
texts.en: Mr. Miguel is originally from this city and has worked for a construction company for 10 years, his wife Concepción helps him with the household expenses because she sells used clothing outside their home. The house where they live has no protection in front and is on one of the busiest streets in town and there is a great risk to the children, their grandchildren, and he is scared that one day when someone is not paying attention, something bad will happen to the them. Now, he is determined to protect the safety of his family by constructing a front gate.

loans.use: finish the handrail in from of his house.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: Cuando Susana se caso comenzó a trabajar en el negocio del café al lado de su esposo y fue él quien le enseñó todo lo relacionado a la producción. Ella algunas de las actividades que llevan a cabo en el cafetal que son regulación de sombra, podas, resiembras, cuatro chapeos por año y en cada cosecha hacen entre cuatro y seis cortes. Durante la última cosecha les fue muy bien ya que lograron una producción total de 35 toneladas las cuales fueron vendidas a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para su exportación. Susana espera que la próxima cosecha les vaya tan bien como en la que acaba de pasar y necesita comprar fertilizantes y plantas nuevas para su cafetal; por esta razón solicita un crédito pues con esto podrá darle continuidad al proyecto en el que tanto han trabajado. Susana y su esposo tienen un hijo y su mayor ilusión es poder darle todo lo necesario para que tenga una buena educación y pueda asistir a la universidad dentro de unos años.
texts.en:
When Susana got married she started working in the coffee business alongside her husband; he taught her everything related to production.  She does some of the tasks in the coffee fields such as adjusting shade, pruning, replanting, four weedings per year and each harvest consists of four to six cuts.

They did very well with the previous harvest in that production was 35 tons that were sold to the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” [coffee cooperative] to be exported.  Susana hopes the next harvest will be as good as the one just completed and needs to buy fertilizer and new plants which is why she’s asking for a loan in order to give continuity to the project they’ve worked so hard at.

Susana and her husband have a son and their greatest wish is to give him everything necessary so that he’ll have a good education and can attend university in a few years.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is married and has 1 child. She is 20 years old and lives in Nacional, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. For the past year, Sharon has operated a business selling dried fish. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to be used to purchase additional dried fish for sale. Sharon became a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, she hopes to engage in another type of business.

loans.use: To purchase additional dried fish for sale

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha is married and has four children. She is 52 years old and lives in Proper Langcangan, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. For the past 3 years, Editha has operated a general store business, earning approximately PHP 3,000 monthly. She has requested a loan of PHP 12,000 to purchase more stock for her store. Editha has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. She hopes to have a brighter future ahead.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: José Tomás

texts.es:
El joven José Tomás es un joven Sauceño que se ha caracterizado por luchar, salir adelante por sí solo, prepararse profesionalmente y que hoy agradece a sus padres por los valores inculcados porque hoy se desempeña como un excelente profesional.
Su profesión le permite ser feliz porque hace lo que le gusta, impartir clases a jóvenes de secundaria que son el futuro de Nicaragua, donde lleva muchos años practicando esta actividad.
Una de las necesidades que tiene en este momento es adquirir un préstamo para compra de medicina y realización de exámenes para mejorar la salud de su madre quienes dependen de él y a quienes trata de darles lo mejor como buen hijo que es.
Por tal motivo se acercó por primera vez a Ceprodel para que le apoyen con dicha solicitud, el que estará eternamente agradecido porque sin esta ayuda muchos sueños y necesidades no pudieran llevarse a cabo.
texts.en:
José Tomás is a young man from El Sauce who is noted for being tenacious and for moving forward by his own efforts to prepare him professionally.  He thanks his parents for the values they instilled in him because today he is an excellent professional.

His profession allows him to be happy because he does what he loves: teaching secondary school students who are Nicaragua’s future.  He’s been practicing his profession for many years.

One of the needs he has at present is to get a loan to buy medicine and to pay for some medical tests to improve his mother’s health; she depends on him and being the good son he is he always tries to give her the best.

Because of this he approached Ceprodel for the first time so that they will help him with this request.  He will be eternally grateful because without this support many dreams and needs will remain unmet.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
Adriana es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, y para generar los ingresos de su hogar tiene una venta de ropa la cual ofrece a sus vecinos, amigos y conocidos que poco a poco van haciendo que los clientes de su negocio aumenten progresivamente. La actividad la inició en vista de que su empleo anterior no le permitía ofrecer en su hogar los ingresos que requería para sostener los gastos y darles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos, y ahora gracias a sus ventas puede tener en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Debido a que tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero no cuenta con el capital necesario para satisfacerlos, Adriana busca un préstamo que le permita comprar ropa para satisfacer los pedidos que tiene por parte de sus clientes.

De esta manera seguirá saliendo adelante con sus 2 hijos y les podrá ofrecer unas mejores oportunidades económicas en un futuro. Su sueño es tener un almacén donde pueda ofrecer sus productos y pueda ser más reconocida por sus clientes, así también aumentar su clientela y tener mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Adriana is a single mother head of household; she has two children who are 6 and 8 years of age.  In order to generate household income she sells clothes to her neighbors, friends and acquaintances.  The number of her customers has been progressively growing.  

She started her business because her previous job did not produce enough income for her to be able to cover all family expenses or to give her children a better quality of life and better opportunities for economic progress.

Because she has large pending customer orders but does not have the necessary capital to fill them, Adriana is looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy clothes to fill all pending customer orders.

In this way she will continue moving forward with her two children and will be able to offer them better economic opportunities in the future.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her products and become better known by her customers as well as to increase her clientele and have better sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Aalia's Group

texts.en:
Aalia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for further improvement of her son’s salon business. He will use the loan investment to buy scissors, hair dressing tools and cosmetics to improve his business. He will also increase the number of chairs at his salon to provide better seating arrangements for his clients. He has been operating his business for many years and Aalia is confident that he will be able to earn more profits from his business by investing the loan.

Aalia is a sewing expert and works for her neighboring clients. Her husband is a rickshaw driver, providing transport services to his passengers. Aalia has 3 other children who are studying in a nearby school. She is confident that she will continue providing better quality education to her children by improving her eldest son's business.

loans.use: To buy salon equipment and cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy scrap for her husband's scrap selling business

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: La Sra. Silvia desgraciadamente es viuda y cuenta con una pensión vitalicia.  Su hija la mayor la apoya con todo lo que pueda en los gastos de su vivienda. Silvia recibe un sueldo quincenal por el trabajo que desempeña en una oficina de gestoría. Tiene una niña de secundaria y un niño de primaria, son su motivación y por ellos quiere salir adelante y darles lo mejor para vivir; es por ello que quiere mejorar la calidad de su vivienda mejorando el piso de la sala y recamara con azulejo.
texts.en: Silvia is a widow, unfortunately, and she receives a life pension. Her oldest daughter helps her as much as she can with her housing expenses. Silvia gets a bi-weekly salary from her job at an administrative office. She has a daughter in middle school and a son in elementary school. They are her motivation and her reason to get ahead. She wants to give them the best life she can. That is why she wants to make improvements on her home, by installing new tile floors the living room and bedroom.

loans.use: to put in tile in the living room and bedroom.

loans.name: Maria Aurora

texts.es:
La señora  María de 45 años de edad, es madre soltera  vive en su propia casa que es de adobe, en la comunidad de la Criba San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, dedicándose al negocio de pulpería desde hace 2 años pues ahí ella vende frescos, churros, jabón, detergentes, maseca y todo lo que abarrotería se refiere, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo y sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos de su comunidad.
Doña María solicita el préstamo de 5,000.00 lempiras  para comprar productos como  agua, frescos, jabón, manteca, arroz, azúcar, café, que son los productos que mas se venden.
Con el apoyo de este préstamo Doña María desea surtir un poco su negocio para obtener más ganancias.
Doña María su sueño es mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Señora María, aged 45, is a single mother and lives in her own adobe house in the community of Criba San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has been running her grocery for two years, in which she sells soda, churros (strips of fried dough), soap, detergents, maseca (a brand of instant corn masa mix) and anything that is usually sold in a grocery. Her store is open from Monday to Sunday and her customers are her friends and neighbors in her community.

Doña María applies for a loan of 5000 lempiras to buy products like water, soda, soap, lard, rice, sugar and coffee, which are the best selling goods in her store. With the help of this loan she wants to stock up somewhat her store and thus earn a higher profit.

Her dream is to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy water, soda, soap, lard, rice, sugar and coffee for her business.

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es: Braulio comenzó desde pequeño a trabajar ayudando a su madre en la finca que su padre les heredó. Él y sus hermanos se levantaban desde muy temprano a realizar distintas labores en el cafetal y con el paso del tiempo fueron adquiriendo más terrenos. Actualmente Braulio está casado con Benita desde hace más de 30 años y tienen 6 hijos. Toda la familia está involucrada en la producción pues son muchas las actividades que se tienen que llevar a cabo en la finca para tener un buen rendimiento. Durante la cosecha que es cuando hay más trabajo Braulio contrata 6 trabajadores a quienes les paga según la cantidad de café que corten. Para la siguiente cosecha Braulio necesita sembrar nueva planta, comprar fertilizante y hacer labores de preparación de su terreno para que tenga un mejor rendimiento; es por eso que él solicita un crédito, pues de otra manera le será imposible llevar a cabo estas actividades al 100%. Además de dedicarse a la producción de café, Braulio y su familia cuentan con una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su casa para de esta manera obtener un ingreso extra y la cual en un futuro desea ampliar.
texts.en:
Braulio started working when he was little helping his mother with the farm his father passed down to them.  He and his siblings would rise very early to do various chores in the coffee plantation and in time they acquired more land.  

Braulio currently has been married to Benita for more than 30 years and they have six children. The entire family is involved with production because there are many tasks that need to be done in order for the farm to be productive.  During harvest which is when there is the most work to be done Braulio hires six laborers that he pays according to how much coffee they cut.

For the next harvest, Braulio needs to plant new plants and to buy fertilizer and to do the soil preparation so that it will produce better yields which is why he’s asking for a loan because otherwise it would be impossible to carry out all these activities to the fullest.

In addition to growing coffee, Braulio and his family also have a small grocery store at home so that they can earn a little extra money; he’d like to expand it in the future.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Romel Santiago

texts.es:
El Señor  Romel Santiago es originario del municipio de El Sauce, como jefe de su hogar es responsable de llevar el sustento a su familia por tal motivo tiene muchos años de dedicarse al comercio donde su negocio consiste en una pulpería donde ofrece abarrotería en general.
Trabaja todos los días desde muy temprano en conjunto con su esposa, su negocio se caracteriza por la amabilidad de ellos y por la variedad de productos con que cuenta dicho negocio.
En la actualidad tiene la necesidad de adquirir su cuarto crédito para surtir dicho negocio de productos que demandan sus clientes y que por falta de capital no ha podido abastecer, por tal razón lo está solicitando en Ceprodel donde tiene varios años de trabajar y quien le ha apoyado con sus solicitudes para su negocio a quien agradece porque gracias a este apoyo hoy cuentan con capital para tener un trabajo digno de que vivir.
Cabe señalar que este crédito será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, jabón, golosinas, gaseosas y ropa.
texts.en:
Romel Santiago is from the town of El Sauce.  As head of his household, it is his responsibility to provide for his family.  He has been working in commerce for many years.  His business is a grocery store where he sells general groceries.

Romel Santiago works every day, from very early in the morning, together with his wife.  They are known for their friendliness and the range of products that their business offers.

Romel Santiago currently needs to acquire his fourth loan in order to stock his business with products that his customers are demanding and which, through a lack of capital, he has not been able to buy.  He is requesting a loan from Ceprodel whom he has been working with for a number of years and who have supported him in his requests.  He is grateful to them because, thanks to their support, he now has the capital he needs to earn a decent living.

This loan will be invested in buying rice, sugar, beans, oil, soap, candies, soda and clothing.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, soap, candies, soda and clothing

loans.name: Los Aguacatillo Group

texts.es:
La señora Carmen Alejandra está unida a su esposo, tiene 27 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, inicio este negocio con poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica  a la construcción de vivienda.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería consistente en frutas: piñas, sandias, melones, etc. En el futuro espera tener más capital y mejorar sus ventas. Las demás integrantes se dedican a comercio de frutas, venta de productos por catalogo, y las otras 2 trabaja para una empresa.
texts.en:
Carmen Alejandra is 27 years old, married, and studied 6 years in primary school.  She has 2 children, 1 of whom is currently studying.  She has been selling fruit and vegetables for 6 years and started her business with very little money.  She is able to help her husband with money, he works in housing construction.  

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise: pineapple, watermelon, and melon etc.  In the future she hopes to have more capital to improve her business.  The businesses of the other group members are; selling fruit as well, catalog sales, and the other 2 work for a company.

loans.use: To buy fruits. to sell.

loans.name: Alba Nelly

texts.es:
Alba se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 9 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida, por esto, debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, Alba decidió montar su propio negocio el cual es una venta de comida que prepara desde su casa. Desde que comenzó con la actividad ha logrado tener mejores ingresos en el hogar permitiendo así una mejor calidad de vida y mejor estabilidad económica para progresar. Su principal dificultad en el negocio siempre ha sido la falta de capital, pero ahora que tiene la oportunidad de seguir creciendo, busca que un préstamo le permita comprar un refrigerador para conservar las carnes y demás alimentos que requieran estar refrigerados para su conservación.

De esta manera podrá tener menores costos en el negocio, pues podrá comprar en grandes cantidades aprovechando los descuentos, y así la rentabilidad del negocio aumentará considerablemente. Su mayor sueño es el de brindarle a su esposo y sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida en el hogar, además de que sueña con abrir su propio restaurante y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Alba’s married and has two children who are 3 and 9 years of age who she’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life for.  Because of this, due to the fact that her husband’s income is insufficient to cover all household expenses, Alba decided to open her own business which is selling home-cooked meals.  

Since she started this activity she’s earned better income for her home leading to improved quality of life and better economic stability to make progress.  Her main difficulty in her business has always been the lack of capital but now that she has the opportunity to continue to grow she’s looking for a loan to buy a refrigerator to store meat and other foods that need to be kept under refrigeration.

In this way she will be able to lower business costs because she will be able to buy in larger amounts taking advantage of volume discounts and her business’ profitability will thus increase considerably.  Her greatest dream is to be able to provide her husband and two children with a better quality of life at home and she also dreams with opening her own restaurant and generating employment.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and ingredients.

loans.name: Aura Rosa

texts.es:
Aura lleva aproximadamente 25 años trabajando vendiendo productos de uso personal y es gracias a este trabajo que ha logrado hacer aportes económicos en su hogar para que en su familia puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Casada y madre de 2 hijos, Aura siempre se ha preocupado por ofrecerle a sus 2 hijos el acceso a una educación de buena calidad, por esto trabaja fuertemente en su negocio y esto le ha permitido tener una gran cantidad de clientes, lo que se ha visto reflejado en los grandes pedidos que tiene para satisfacer. Sin embargo, debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, Aura busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal para responder a los pedidos que han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera logrará superar la dificultad de capital y logrará responder a los pedidos de sus clientes, aumentando sus ingresos y así tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Aura has been working selling personal use items for about 25 years now and thanks to this work has been able to contribute economically to her home so that her family can have a better quality of life.  She’s married and the mother of two children.  

Aura has always tried to offer her two children access to a good quality education which is why she works hard in her business.  This has led to her having a large number of customers which has been reflected in the large number of orders she has to fill.  

However, because she does not have sufficient capital to meet her customers’ needs, Aura is looking for a loan to buy personal use items to fill her pending customer orders.  In this way she will overcome the capital problem and be able to fill all her pending orders thus increasing income and having a better quality of life at home.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe ama de casa cuenta con 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, con 20 años de experiencia en el cultivo de café Guadalupe fue enseñada desde muy pequeña el oficio y los cuidados necesarios para la producción de café ella es productora de café orgánico y siempre a enseñado a sus hijos la importancia de ser orgánicos para no contaminar la tierra actualmente produce 10 toneladas por cosecha le gustaría aumentar su producción renovando su siembra con plantas nuevas y fertilizando las ya  sembradas para obtener una mayor cosecha ya que esa es su meta como cafetricultora aumentar su producción sembrando plantas nuevas para lograr tal motivo pide un crédito para la compra de plantas y fertilizante orgánico los cuales empleara en su finca para con ello poder aumentar su producción y al aumentar su producción aumenta sus ganancias económicas las cuales le ayudaran a realizar su sueño que es el de re modelar su casa y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Guadalupe is a 67-year-old housewife who lives in her own home together with her family.  She has 20 years experience growing coffee.  When she was a little girl, Guadalupe was taught this trade.  She was taught how to provide coffee plants with the care they need.  She is an organic coffee producer and has always taught her children the importance of farming organically so as not to pollute the earth.  She currently produces 10 tons of coffee per harvest and would like to increase her production, renewing her farm with new plants and fertilizing her existing plants in order to obtain a bigger harvest.  Her goal as a coffee grower is to increase her production, sowing new plants.  This is why she is requesting a loan.  She will buy plants and organic fertilizers which she will use on her farm so that she can increase her production and her profits.  This will help her to fulfill her dream which is to re-model her home and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her coffee production, sowing more plants and buying organic fertilizers

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz Amparo se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 11 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, desde hace 5 años decidió iniciar su propio negocio de cultivo de café con el cual pudiera generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Gracias a su esfuerzo ahora su cultivo es un gran cultivo de café que es reconocido por tener muy buena calidad en sus productos, y también gracias a este la condición económica de su familia ha mejorado considerablemente, permitiendo que sus 2 hijos y su esposo tengan una mejor calidad de vida. La gran dificultad que está afrontando en estos momentos es el clima que ha deteriorado sus cultivos, y la falta de capital para poder reabonar sus cultivos; es por esto que ahora busca un préstamo que le permita comprar abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para recuperar su cultivo y afrontar las fuertes condiciones climáticas.

De esta manera logrará sacar productos de buena calidad y podrá tener en su hogar los ingresos que este le genera, de tal forma que sus hijos puedan seguir accediendo a una educación de buena calidad y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Luz Amparo is married and has two children who are 9 and 11 years old.  As the income her husband makes is not enough to cover their household expenses, five years ago she decided to start her own business growing coffee in order to make income and contribute financially to the household.  Thanks to her efforts she is now an important coffee grower and is known for the very good quality of her produce.  In addition, her family's financial situation has improved considerably, allowing her two children and husband to enjoy a better quality of life.  The great difficulty she faces right now is that the weather has damaged her crops and she lacks the capital she needs to re-fertilize them.  For this reason, she is looking for a loan which will allow her to buy fertilizers, insecticides and fungicides to revive her crops and deal with the difficult weather conditions.  This will enable her to grow good-quality crops and make income for her household so that her children can continue receiving a good education and enjoy better financial opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and fungicides to revive her crops and deal with the difficult weather conditions

loans.name: Trabajadores De La Unidad Group

texts.es:
El señor Israel está casado, tiene  41 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la comercialización de medicamentos, inicio este negocio  vendiendo medicinas en una tienda y con poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a los oficio domésticos.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderías, para la farmacia que tiene, pastillas, tabletas de acetaminofen, antibióticos, inyecciones, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un local propio para poder atender a sus clientes. Los demás integrantes se dedican a la venta de medicinas y a la venta de artículos de cocina.
texts.en:
Israel is married, 41 years old, and studied 3 years in primary education.  He has 3 children, 2 of which are currently studying.  He has 20 years of experience selling medicine in a small store that he started with very little money.  He is helped by his wife who works in the home.

He has organized a group to request a loan to buy merchandise for the pharmacy such as pills, acetaminophen tablets, antibiotics, injections, etc.  In the future he hopes to have a local office where he can attend to his clients.  The other group members work in medical sales and kitchen supply sales.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical products.

loans.name: Las Peñas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS PEÑAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Veneranda es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: producción de queso, venta de chuño y papa, cría de ganado, cría de chancho, cría de oveja.

La señora Veneranda, indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la promoción llegada al lugar. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de queso, ganado y agricultura, ella cuenta que hace veinte años atrás recibió un terreno y desde esa fecha ella trabaja el mismo conjuntamente sus hijos.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la alimentación de los ganados y para el cultivo (compra de forraje y semillas) mismo que comprará de las personas distribuidoras y posteriormente a la producción lo comercializará en las ferias de su comunidad. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es separada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta que el crédito es fácil.
texts.en:
The “Las Peñas” (The Cliffs) communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Achacachi Focal Center; it has 8 members led by a governing board headed by Veneranda.  The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of business activities like: cheese making, potato and dehydrated potato sales, animal husbandry, pig raising and sheep raising.

Veneranda indicates that this is the first time she’s been in Pro Mujer having joined thanks to a promotional event in her area.  She currently has a cheese-making business and also raises cattle and works in agriculture.  She relates that she got a parcel of land twenty years ago and has worked it with her children ever since.

The loan she’ll take out now is for her livestock’s feed and for the crops.  She will buy forage and seeds from suppliers and will sell her production in local street markets.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family as much as possible since she’s separated and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes that the loans are easy.

loans.use: to buy forage and seeds.

loans.name: Candida Felipa

texts.es: Candida de 45 años de edad es soltera, tiene su propio negocio de pulperia en su casa de habitacion, donde ofrece productos para el consumo del hogar, esta solicitando su credito con el objetivo de comprar productos para el negocio y fortalecerlo, comprara granos basicos (arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, maiz), verduras y golosinas para los niños que le compran en el barrio y asi ofrecerle a su clientela variedad de productos que le permita incrementar sus ventas y obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Candida is 45 years old and single. She has her own business, which is a small grocery store in her home where she offers household products.

She is requesting a loan to buy products for her business and to strengthen it.  She will buy basic grains (rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn) vegetables and candy for children that purchase them in the neighborhood, so she can offer her customers a variety of products, which will allow her to increase her sales and obtain improved earnings.

loans.use: to buy basic grains (rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn) vegetables and candy for children

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es: Don Pablo de 66 años de edad es casado, tiene 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores y tiene su propia familia.  Trabaja como vendedor desde hace mas de 20 años, ofreciendole a su clientela productos variados para uso personal y del hogar.  Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de comprar articulos para su negocio, pues el vende panas, botas de hule, pichingas, capotes, y cosas de plastico y de esta manera ofrecer diversidad a sus clientes.  Vende sus productos tanto en su casa como fuera, ya que sale a los puertos de montaña donde hay bastante clientela.
texts.en:
Pablo is 66 years old and married. He has 3 grown up children who have their own families. He has worked as a salesman for more than 20 years, offering his customers various products for home and personal use. 

He is requesting his 8th loan to buy items for his business such as corduroys, rubber boots, containers, cloaks, and plastics and be able to offer his customers more diversity. He sells his products at home and outside, since he travels to the foot of the mountain where there is a better customer base.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as corduroys, rubber boots, containers, cloaks, and plastics

loans.name: Felisa Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Felisa Margarita está casada, tiene 22 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa típica para damas, inicio este negocio con su señora madre y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposo.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de mercadería, consistente en comprar ropa típica para mujeres, ella espera que en el futuro tenga un capital propio y un negocio amplio, para que así  pueda mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Felisa Margarita’s married; she’s 22-years-old and completed fifth grade.  She sells clothes for women, a business she started with her mother.  To date she has three years’ experience and she also gets economic support from her husband.

She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise consisting in typical clothes for women.  She hopes in future to have her own capital and a large business in order to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Yaleidis

texts.es: Yaleidis  de 35 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 3 y 11 años en la hermosa ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, lugar ubicado a orillas del Mar Caribe,  uno de los sitios turísticos mas hermosos de Colombia y muy reconocido, pues   tiene una de las principales bases navales del país y  por su patrimonio histórico-artístico, que abarca de vestigios de época cartaginesa, romana, bizantina, edificaciones de carácter militar de época moderna y contemporánea, así como también edificios neoclásicos y modernistas.  En este soñado panorama, Yaleidis tiene su  modesto negocio, donde elabora almuerzos, que ofrece entre clientes ubicados en el sector, albañiles trabajadores informales, quienes son sus principales clientes, a los que les vende a crédito principalmente y recupera su inversión en plazos semanas. Su meta es adecuar la infraestructura de su negocio, pues los espacios donde habita y funciona este negocio no son suficientes para su familia, debido a que su negocio se le ha crecido. Su mayor desafío es no tener el capital de trabajo suficiente, para lograr su sueño  y por eso debe hacer crecer su negocio, trabajando en su mercado mas efectivamente, organizando sus compras y buscando mejores alternativas entre sus proveedores. En la actualidad Yaleidis está aplicando un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará materias primas  e insumos, como arroz por bultos, aceite  y  harinas,  los cuales requiere para su producción y teniendo inventarios, disminuiría los costos del transporte, ahorraría en los precios por compras por mayor volumen y esto es justamente lo que potencializa el éxito de su inversión.
texts.en: Yaleidis, 35, lives with her partner and their two children, 11- and 3-years old, respectively.  They live in Cartagena de India, a beautiful city on Colombia's Caribbean coast.  The city is one of the country's loveliest and best-known tourist spots and the home of one of its largest naval bases.  Its historic-artistic heritage has come down to the city from older ones--Carthage, Rome, Byzantium--and the old mixes beautifully with the new.  Yaleidis operates her restaurant business here, in this perfect place.  She makes and sells prepared meals, mostly for the day laborers, construction workers, etc. who work in the area.  She sells on credit and collects from her customer once a week.  She wants to improve the space where she works because she operates the business in her house and there's not enough room for both the business and her family.  She is applying for a loan because she doesn't have enough working capital to carry out the improvements.  Yaleidis will use your Kiva loan to buy the basic supplies--rice, cooking oil, flour, etc.--she needs to continue her business.  The investment will allow her to reduce her transportation costs and buy wholesale supplies of everything she needs at a lower cost than she would otherwise have to pay.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Don Santos tiene 59 años de edad, es casado, tiene 6 hijos y vive con su familia en el Municipio de Concepción del Sur, Santa Barbará.
Don Santos tiene 4 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, producción de café, la venta la hace en los mercados locales ya que este negocio esta siendo muy rentable en el país. Su finca esta ubicada en una zona apta para este cultivo.
Actualmente solicito un préstamo de 14,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizante para darle la asistencia necesaria a la finca, y así sacar una mejor producción para la venta.
Su plan es seguir invirtiendo con la ayuda que Odef y Kiva le han brindado sacando su cultivo adelante.
texts.en:
Santos, 59, is married and has six children; he lives with his family in the municipality of Concepción del Sur, Santa Bárbara.

Santos has been working in agriculture for four years; he’s a coffee grower and sells to local markets since this is a very profitable business in the country.  His farm is located in an area that’s appropriate for this.

He’s currently asking for a 14,000 lempira loan to buy fertilizer to provide needed care to his farm and to obtain better yields to sell.  His plan is to continue investing with the help he gets from ODEF and KIVA to succeed with his crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is married. She has one child she takes care of. She wants the loan to pay for more seeds, seed multiplication (production of seeds for sale or for future planting), and labor to get the best harvest. She plans to use the profits for paying school fees for her child. In the future, she would like to see her agriculture business prospering.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions.

Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for more seeds, seed multiplication and labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products such as shampoo, perfumes, children's clothes, and if there is enough, grains (rice and sugar)

loans.name: Lesvia De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Lesvia de 47 años ees soltera, tiene un hijo de 21 años de edad, el cual le ayuda con los deberes del hogar y el trabajo de la finquita.  Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de comprar 3 terneros para cuidarlos, desarrollarlos y posteriormente venderlos cuando obtengan su peso y asi obtener ganancias que le permitan el sustento familiar.  Cabe señalar que doña Lesvia se ha caracterizado por ser muy responsable con el pago de sus creditos y muy luchadora.
texts.en: Lesvia is 47 years old and single. She has one son, age 21, who helps her with the household tasks and the work on the little farm. She is requesting her 8th loan with the aim of buying 3 calves, so she can take care of them, raise them and later sell them when they reach their weight, and thus obtain earnings which will permit her to sustain the family. It should be noted that Lesvia has shown herself to be very responsible with the payment of her loans and very hard-working.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Adilia Esperanza

texts.es:
Adilia sigue laborando como cocinera en un restaurante, los fines de semana hace sopa para vender, ayudándose a tener otros pequeños ingresos, su objetivo ha sido la mejora  a su casa,  teniendo el apoyo de su esposo el cual trabaja como chofer
Con el crédito anterior era para comenzar la construcción, pero no ajusto, ya que los materiales están a costos muy alto, lo que con este nuevo préstamo comprara: cemento y para la mano de obra. Lo que es piedra, arena, hierro lo tiene comprado. Y que espera comenzar la obra, teniendo mejor comodidad para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Adilia is still working as a cook at a restaurant. On weekends, she earns extra money making soup for sale.  Her immediate goal is to improve her house, work that her husband--a driver--supports.  
Adilia hoped a past loan would be enough to start work, but she needs an extra loan because the services and materials she needs--laborers, cement--cost more than she expected.  She hopes she can start construction soon because she wants to provide her children with a decent place to live.

loans.use: to pay for construction services and materials.

loans.name: Hector Wilfredo

texts.es:
Hector tiene 33 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene 3 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 1, 4 y 6 años de edad a quienes quiere muchísimo y por quienes trabaja muy duro para darles una vida digna y sobre todo sean mejores que el. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho realizar algunos arreglos en su vivienda pero también le gusta compartir con su familia uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Estofado”. El estudio la carrera de Mecánica de vehículos.

Día a día Hector trabaja en su negocio de venta de peces ornamentales así como también vende pan, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes al día, con los ingresos puede solventar los gastos de su hogar,; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y es muy trabajador.

Héctor está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva y que gracias a su ayuda el podrá realizar la reparación de su horno de barro en el cual prepara sus panes, ya que esta malogrado y ha tenido inconvenientes en el horneado de sus panes, así de esta manera tendrá la maquinaria necesaria para poder seguir trabajando y poder seguir luchando para realizar su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Hector is 33 years old and he lives with his wife and their 3 children aged 1, 4 and 6, whom he deeply loves and for whom he works really hard so that they can both enjoy a more dignified life and become better professionals than himself. Whenever he has some free time, Hector loves engaging in DIY works in his house, but he also likes eating one of his favorite dishes, the delicious “Estofado”* and sharing it with his family. He has studied Mechanical Engineering.

Hector works every day in his shop, selling ornamental fish and bread. He works around 10 hours a day and he can serve up to 15 customers per day. Thanks to his income he is able to pay for his household expenses. He thinks his activity is going well because he is a very hard-working person and he is very kind with his customers.

Hector is deeply grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to fix the clay oven he uses to prepare his bread: since it is broken, Hercto has had a few problems in baking his bread. Through this mean he will have the machine he needs to keep on working and to keep on engaging in making his biggest dream come true: “To have his children pursue a profession”.

<cite>*“Estofado” is a chicken or beef stew.</cite>

loans.use: To have his clay oven fixed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment for his tailoring business.

loans.name: Sayda Melania

texts.es:
La joven Sayda Melania es originaria de una comarca aledaña al municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida.
Es una joven dedicada a su hogar donde habita con su madre e hija y las cuales en conjunto trabajan arduamente día a día en su negocio el cual se trata de una pulpería surtida de abarrotería y ropa en general la cual tiene 15 de tenerla, actividad que le ha permitido mejorar su vivienda, darles el sustento a su hogar y vivir dignamente como todo nicaragüense.
Uno de sus sueños es fortalecer su negocio ampliándolo de productos que demandan sus clientes para satisfacer la demanda aprovechando que es el más fuerte que existe en la zona, por tal motivo se acercó por primera vez a Ceprodel con el objetivo de obtener su primer crédito para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, jabón, azúcar, maíz, gaseosas y ropa variada.
Espera y confía en Dios que su solicitud sea aprobada para llevar a cabo su objetivo y llegar a tener una relación duradera con tal Institución.
texts.en:
Sayda Melania is from a district adjacent to the municipality of El Sauce where she’s lived her entire life.  She’s a young woman dedicated to her home where she lives with her mother and daughter who work hard together day to day in her business consisting of a grocery store stocked with groceries and clothes.  She’s had it for 15 years and the activity has made it possible for her to improve her home and provide sustenance in order to live with dignity like all Nicaraguans.

One of her dreams is to strengthen the business by expanding the inventory of products requested by her customers and meeting their needs which is the strongest in the zone.  Because of this she approached Ceprodel for the first time to obtain her first loan to buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, soap, corn, soft-drinks and assorted clothing.

She hopes and trusts in god that the application will be approved so that she can reach her objective and to have a lasting relationship with Ceprodel.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Señor  Pedro es originario del municipio de El Sauce, se dedica al pequeño comercio desde hace muchos años donde tiene gran experiencia en el ramo del comercio.
Como padre responsable y a cargo de su familia compuesta por sus hijos y esposa trabaja día a día para llevar el sustento a su hogar y pagar la universidad de dichos hijos ya que su gran sueño es verlos preparados profesionalmente para que se defiendan en un futuro.
Su negocio consiste en la venta de ropa, medicamentos y plásticos de manera ambulante visitando a sus posibles compradores dueños de pulperías, negocio que le ha permitido salir adelante en preparar a sus hijos los cuales están estudiando una carrera universitaria, construir su propia vivienda y comprar sus bienes como vehículos los cuales le sirven para realizar sus gestiones de trabajo.
Debido a la gran demanda de sus clientes y que está captando nuevos clientes necesita un crédito para adquirir medicamentos, ropa interior y plásticos por lo cual está solicitando su cuarto crédito para llevar a cabo su objetivo y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
Espera y confía en Dios que su solicitud sea aprobada para poder cumplir su objetivo ya que necesita este crédito como capital de trabajo, ya que ofrece crédito a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pedro is from the municipality of El Sauce.  He’s been a small merchant for many years and has much experience in commerce.

As a father responsible for his family composed of his children and his wife he works hard day to day to provide sustenance for his home and to pay for 
said children’s university since his great dream is to see them become prepared professionally so that they can fend for themselves in the future.

His business consists in selling clothes, medicine and plastic items from place to place visiting potential customers who are small shop owners.  The business has allowed him to move forward and to educate his children who are studying university careers, to build his house and to buy assets like vehicles that help him carry out his business transactions.

Due to the large customer demand and that he’s acquiring new customers he needs a loan to get medicine, underwear and plastic items so he’s asking for his 4th loan to carry out his objective and meet customer demand.

He hopes and trusts in God that his application will be approved to be able to reach his objective since he needs this loan as working capital since he sells to his customers on credit.

loans.use: to buy medicine, uderwear and plastic items.

loans.name: Gloria Cecilia

texts.es:
Desde hace 14 años tiene su negocio de venta de relojes, reparación y mantenimiento de los mismos, y gracias a este ha logrado contribuir económicamente en su hogar para que su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 10 y 19 años de edad puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Anteriormente tenía su negocio ubicado en un local arrendado, pero cuando le pidieron el local no le quedó otra alternativa que dejar su negocio en la calle y así hacerse nuevamente con sus clientes para que su negocio saliera adelante. En su familia siempre han tenido dificultades económicas, pero gracias al esfuerzo que hace en su negocio ha podido en algunas oportunidades mitigar las dificultades y poder contar con una buena estabilidad económica, y es por esto que se esfuerza diariamente para que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que se le han ido agotando algunos repuestos de relojes que utiliza para el mantenimiento de los mismos, Gloria busca que un préstamo le permita comprar repuestos y artículos de relojería que se han ido agotando para seguir prestando el servicio de reparación y mantenimiento de relojes.

De esta manera sus clientes podrán seguir recibiendo un buen servicio en su negocio y así sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, permitiéndole tener mejores ingresos para su hogar y así su familia puede contar con una mejor estabilidad económica. Su mayor sueño es volver a ubicar su negocio dentro de un local y así ofrecer sus productos desde una mayor comodidad.
texts.en: Gloria Cecilia has been running her business selling, repairing and maintaining watches for 14 years.  This has allowed her to contribute financially to her household so that her husband and her two children, who are 10 and 19 years old, can enjoy a better quality of life.  Her business used to be located in rented premises.  When the landlords asked for the premises back she had no other alternative but to set up her business in the street and re-establish herself with her customers so that she could make progress.  Gloria Cecilia's family have always suffered financial difficulties but, thanks to the efforts she puts into her business, she has often been able to mitigate the problems and enjoy good financial stability.  She works hard every day so that her family can enjoy a better quality of life.  As some of the parts she uses in mending watches have been running out, Gloria is looking for a loan that will allow her to buy more watch parts and accessories so that she can continue providing a watch repair and maintenance service.  This will mean her customers will be able to continue receiving a good service and her sales will increase considerably.  As a result, she will make better income for her household and her family will enjoy better financial stability.  Her biggest dream is to re-locate her business into proper premises so that she can offer her products for sale more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy watch parts and accessories as she is running low

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is married with four children aged between 9 and 18. All of them attend school. His wife is also a maize farmer. He has been a maize farmer for 10 years. He would like to get this loan to pay for more seeds, seed multiplication (production of seeds for sale or for future planting), and labor to get the best harvest. With the profits, he plans to pay school fees.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. 

Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for more seeds, seed multiplication and labor costs.

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло прекрасная работящая мать  четырёх детей. Всю свою жизнь она провела, работая на поле и продавая его урожай, чтобы прокормит свою семью. Также она занимается  выращиванием КРС. В этом деле ей помогает её старшая дочка, которая знает  это занятие с самого детства. Она решилась  обратиться в Imon International  за небольшим займом в размере 1200 долларов , чтобы приобрести семена, минеральные добавки и удобрения. Также её семье хотелось бы купить  КРС (2гол). Она надеется, что дорогие кредиторы не останутся  в стороне и протянут руку помощи.
texts.en: Shahlo is a wonderful working mother of four children. All her life she has spent working on the field and selling its harvest to feed her family. She also does breeding of large horned cattle. Her oldest daughter helps her in this business who knows it well since her childhood. Shahlo has decided to come to IMON International for a small loan in the amount of $1,200 USD to buy seeds, mineral additives and fertilizer. She also wants to buy two heads of large horned cattle. She hopes that dear lenders will respond and lend a helping hand.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and cattle.

loans.name: Ruvie Ann

texts.en: Ruvie Ann is a 32-year-old widow who has a child. She lives in Panay Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Ruvie Ann used her last loan to purchase additional vehicle spare parts and accessories. Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to repair the existing vehicle for better service. In the future, she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es: A José Ricardo desde pequeño sus padres le fueron enseñando a trabajar en la finca de café de la familia y cuando a los 20 años se casó con María Isabel se independizó y comenzó a trabajar junto con su esposa en un terreno que su padre le regaló, aunque aún sigue apoyando con trabajo a sus padres pues debido a su edad ya no pueden hacer trabajos muy pesados. El café que José Ricardo produce es convencional y quiere cambiar toda su producción a café orgánico ya que este no utiliza fertilizantes químicos por lo que no deteriora el medio ambiente. El proceso de conversión de convencional a orgánico lleva un tiempo aproximado de 3 años ya que renovar toda la finca. Para comenzar a llevar a cabo este proyecto el comenzará por una parte de su terreno y necesita un crédito para comprar planta de café y fertilizante orgánico. En un futuro a José Ricardo le gustaría adquirir más terrenos pues de esta manera les podrá dejar a sus 3 hijos un patrimonio pues ya todos están casados.
texts.en:
José Ricardo’s parents taught him how to work in the family’s coffee plantation since he was very little.  When he married María at the age of 20, he became independent and started to work alongside his wife in a field his father gave him although he still continues to help his parents with their work since at their age they are no longer able to do the more demanding tasks.

The coffee José Ricardo produces is conventional and he wants to convert to organic coffee production since it does not use chemical fertilizers so the environment isn’t damaged.  The conversion process to organic takes about three years since the entire farm must be replaced.

To start to carry out this project he’ll begin in part of his land and needs a loan to buy coffee plants and organic fertilizer.  In the future, José Ricardo would like to acquire more land in order to leave his three children an estate since they are all now married.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Alba se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 14 años, y debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, Alba decidió comenzar a trabajar por su cuenta en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades económicas. Fue así como montó un cultivo de verduras con el cual ha logrado generar ingresos para su hogar que han permitido tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, sin embargo no cuenta con el capital suficiente que le permita ampliar la capacidad de su cultivo; es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar riegos, abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para aumentar la capacidad de su cultivo.

Así superará la dificultad de capital en su negocio y podrá satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá tener mejores oportunidades económicas para brindar en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba is married and has one 14 year old child. Due to the fact that her husband's income was not sufficient to sustain the household expenses, Alba decided to begin working on her own in search of better economic opportunities. It was in this way that she began cultivating vegetables, with which she has been able to generate household earnings that have allowed her to have a better quality of life and better economic opportunities. Thanks to the good quality of her products her customers make very good orders. However, she does not have sufficient capital that would allow her to expand the capacity of her crops. It is for this reason that she is seeking this loan, which will allow her to buy hoses, fertilizer, insecticide and fungicide to increase the production of her crops. 

With this, she will overcome the capital difficulties of her business and be able to satisfy the demand of her customers, which will allow her to have improved economic opportunities to bring to her home a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hoses, fertilizer, insecticide and fungicide to increase the capacity of her crops.

loans.name: Xiomara Concepción

texts.es:
Doña Xiomara Concepción es una Sauceña dedicada por muchos años a la educación de primaria, labor que le satisface desempeñarla porque está contribuyendo un granito de arena en el desarrollo de nuestro país en enseñarles a leer y escribir a niños de todas las edades.
Esta actividad le ha permitido sacar adelante a su única hija como madre soltera.
Una de las necesidades que tiene en estos momentos es adquirir un préstamo para subsidiar gastos para su salud, ya que con su pequeño salario no puede cubrir tantos gastos por lo que recurrió a esta financiera con  el fin de que le apoyen con su solicitud y mejorar para salir adelante y seguir con su labor.
Espera que dicha financiera le apoye y poder llegar a tener una relación duradera por muchos años.
texts.en:
Doña Xiomara Concepción is from El Sauce.  She has worked for local schools for many years and says that she likes the work because teaching children to read and write is a small, but important, contribution to the country's development.
Income from the job is enough for her--a single mom--and her daughter to live.
Doña Xiomara Concepción is applying for a loan that she will use to pay medical costs because her small income isn't enough to cover everything that she needs.  Your loan will allow her to get the help she needs so that she can continue working and supporting herself.
She hopes you will help her and that she can continue working for many years to come.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses.

loans.name: Jose Alirio

texts.es:
Jose ha trabajado gran parte de su vida en la actividad de la agricultura, pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y desde muy temprana edad se la enseñó para trabajar a su lado. Desde entonces esta ha sido su profesión y gracias a la experiencia que ha adquirido hoy es su fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Debido a los cambios de clima que han venido sucediendo en los últimos meses, gran parte de sus cultivos de plátanos se han visto afectados, por esto Jose requiere un préstamo para comprar abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas que le permitan reabonar su cultivo y sacarlo adelante a pesar de los cambios de climas que lo afectan.

De esta manera podrá ofrecer a sus clientes productos de buena calidad y así recibir buenos ingresos por estos. Además, seguirá progresando con su cultivo y su familia tendrá una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José has worked a great part of his life in agriculture because his father was in this occupation and he learned it alongside him when he was very young.  Since then this has been his profession and thanks to the experience he’s acquired today it’s his source of income to meet household expenses.

Due to changes in the weather the last few months, a large portion of the banana crops has been affected which is why José needs a loan to buy manure, insecticide and fungicide to refertilize the crops and have a successful harvest regardless of weather changes that might affect them.  In this way he will be able to offer his customers good quality products and receive in turn good income for them.  Also, he will continue making progress with his crop and his family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Edilma

texts.es:
Edilma es una persona que a lo largo de su vida ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, para lo cual siempre ha tenido una gran fortaleza que la caracteriza que le permite salir adelante. Desde hace aproximadamente 30 años tiene una tienda general donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar y así contribuía económicamente junto con su esposo para el hogar. Actualmente es madre soltera de sus 2 hijos y con su tienda puede sostener los gastos del hogar y brindarles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y estabilidad económica en el hogar. Por las oportunidades que tiene el sector ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes y sus ventas se han aumentado considerablemente, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar que se han estado agotando para surtir su tienda.

De esta manera seguirá ofreciendo a sus clientes una buena atención en su negocio y los clientes seguirán creciendo cada vez más. Su mayor sueño es que su tienda le permita terminar de criar a sus hijos brindándoles buena educación y un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Edilma is a person who throughout her life has had to go through many adversities; she’s always had the strength that characterizes her to overcome them.

She’s had a general store for about 30 years where she offers her customers basic staple items thus contributing alongside her husband to their home.  She’s currently a single mother of two children and is able to support her home and give her children a good quality of life and stable home economy thanks to the store.  

Because of the opportunities she’s had in the sector she’s won over quite a large number of customers and her sales have increased considerably which is why she’s looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy more basic staple items that are running out to stock her store.  In this way she will continue to offer her customers good service and her clientele will continue growing more each time.  

Her greatest dream is that her store will allow her to finish raising her children giving them a good education and a stable economic future.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
